1352.name: Nicro 602 CA Tig (6025HT)
1352.Applications: Welding similar alloys that have to resist extreme high temperature and for cladding steels or stainless steels to obtain a high temperature resistant surface against oxidation.
1352.Suitable_For: Cladding against high temperature, radiant heater tubes, furnace rolls, muffles in bright annealing furnaces (H2 atmosphere), rotary kilns, pipe hangers, waste gas components, hydrogen production, methanol and ammonia synthesis, 1.4767, 2.4633, 2.4649, NiCr25FeAlY, Nicrofer 6025 HT, Alloy 602CA, UNS N06025
